senior_python_engineer.description: Well-matched job for Python engineer with backend experience

job.title: Senior Python Backend Engineer
job.description: We're looking for an experienced Python backend engineer to join our team. You'll be building scalable microservices using Django and deploying on AWS.
job.requirements: 5+ years Python experience, Django or Flask, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, PostgreSQL, REST API design, microservices architecture

senior_python_engineer.notes: This is the primary happy path scenario - CV should match job well

full_stack_developer.description: Full stack role requiring both frontend and backend skills

job.title: Full Stack Developer
job.description: Building web applications from frontend to backend. Work with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
job.requirements: 3+ years experience, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, REST APIs, Git

full_stack_developer.notes: Tests ability to highlight relevant full-stack experience

minimal_job_posting.description: Very brief job description with minimal details
minimal_job_posting.notes: System should still produce valid CV without hallucinating details

unrelated_job.description: Job completely unrelated to candidate's experience

job.title: Marine Biologist
job.description: Research marine ecosystems, study coral reefs, conduct field research.
job.requirements: PhD in Marine Biology, SCUBA certification, 5+ years field research, data analysis

unrelated_job.notes: Should not fabricate relevant experience - use actual CV data

job.title: Junior Python Developer
job.description: Entry-level Python position for recent graduate
job.requirements: Python basics, willingness to learn, Bachelor's degree

minimal_cv.notes: System should work with limited experience

many_requirements.description: Job with very long list of requirements

job.title: Senior Full Stack Architect
job.requirements: 10+ years experience, Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, Vue, Node.js, Django, Flask, Spring Boot, AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Kafka, RabbitMQ, GraphQL, REST, gRPC, Microservices, CI/CD, Jenkins, GitLab CI, Unit testing, Integration testing, Agile, Scrum, Team leadership, Mentoring, Technical writing, System design, Performance optimization, Security best practices

many_requirements.notes: Should prioritize most relevant skills, not try to match everything

repeated_keywords.notes: Should handle poorly written job descriptions gracefully

job.requirements: PhD in ML/AI, published research, experience training large language models, PyTorch, TensorFlow, CUDA programming, distributed training

fabrication_temptation.notes: CRITICAL: Should not fabricate AI/ML experience if not in master CV
